mapper.select: SELECT g.CC_NAME cc_name,c.score score,c.RV_TITLE rv_title,m.NICKNAME nickname,c.SCORE_DATE score_date,c.SCORE_NO score_no,c.USER_NO user_no FROM CCSCORE c join GOLFCC g on g.CC_ID = c.CC_ID join MEMBERLIST m on c.USER_NO=m.USER_NO where g.CC_ID=#{cc_id} order by c.SCORE_DATE desc
select count(*) from CCSCORE c join GOLFCC g on g.CC_ID = c.CC_ID join MEMBERLIST m on c.USER_NO=m.USER_NO
